content: Do you really want to leave this room? You will be able to join it again via new invitation by a room admin.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a confirmation message that appears when a user attempts to leave a room. The message informs them they will be able to rejoin via a new invitation by an admin. It is displayed in a dialog box within the Leave Room Dialog component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You will be able to join it again' is not ideally translated. While 'سيمكنك الانضمام مجدداً' is technically correct, it lacks the natural flow of English. A more natural translation would be something like 'ستتمكن من الانضمام إليها مرة أخرى' or 'ستستطيع العودة للانضمام إليها'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ستتمكن من الانضمام إليها مرة أخرى

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "You will be able to join it again via new invitation by a room admin" is a bit awkward and overly literal. A more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: You could rephrase it as: "Otaq administratorı tərəfindən göndərilən yeni dəvət ilə otağa yenidən qoşulmaq olar." (It is possible to rejoin the room with a new invitation sent by the room administrator.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "You will be able to join it again via new invitation by a room admin" is not perfectly captured by "Podrá volver a entrar a través de una nueva invitación de un administrador de la sala." A more natural phrasing would emphasize the *room* administrator and avoid a slightly awkward wording of 'de un administrador'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ¿Quiere realmente salir de esta sala? Podrá volver a entrar mediante una nueva invitación de un administrador de la sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'room admin' is translated as 'huoneen järjestelmänvalvojan'. While technically correct, a more natural and commonly used term in Finnish would be 'huoneen ylläpitäjän' (room maintainer/moderator).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voit liittyä siihen uudelleen huoneen ylläpitäjän lähettämän uuden kutsun kautta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'սենյակը' (room) is repeated unnecessarily. It is grammatically correct but stylistically awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition. For example: 'Իսկապե՞ս ուզում եք լքել այս սենյակը։ Դուք կկարողանաք կրկին միանալ դրան՝ սենյակի ադմինիստրատորի նոր հրավերի միջոցով։' (Is it really that you want to leave this room? You will be able to rejoin it - via a new invitation from a room administrator.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You will be able to join it again' is not accurately conveyed by 'Potrai unirti nuovamente'. While understandable, a more precise translation would be 'Potrai ricongiungerti' or 'Potrai rientrare' to better capture the meaning of rejoining the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Potrai ricongiungerti tramite un nuovo invito da parte di un amministratore della sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "このまま退室の手続きしてもよろしいですか？" (Kono mama taishitsu no teatsudai shite mo yoroshii desu ka?) is overly formal and literal. It translates to 'May I proceed with the departure procedure?' This is not the natural way to phrase the question in this context. A more natural phrasing would convey a confirmation or agreement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この部屋から退室してもよろしいですか？(Kono heya kara taishitsu shite mo yoroshii desu ka?) or 退室してもよろしいですか？(Taishitsu shite mo yoroshii desu ka?)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English says 'Do you really want to leave?' which implies a sense of confirmation. The current Japanese translation does not convey this sense of urgency or affirmation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 退室してもよろしいですか？念のため確認します。(Taishitsu shite mo yoroshii desu ka? Nen towa ni kakunin shimasu.) - 'Do you want to leave? Just confirming.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ルーム管理者による新たな招待で再び参加することができます' is quite verbose. It lacks the brevity and flow of the English original. It’s a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルーム管理者の新たな招待があれば、再度参加できます。(Ruum kanri-sha no arata na shoutai ga areba, saido sanka dekimasu.) - 'You can rejoin with a new invitation from the room administrator.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "You will be able to join it again" is translated as "ທ່ານຈະສາມາດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມມັນໄດ້ອີກຄັ້ງ". While technically correct, it sounds a bit formal and stiff in Lao. A more natural phrasing would be something like "ເຈົ້າສາມາດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມຫ້ອງນີ້ອີກຄັ້ງໄດ້" (You can join this room again).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຈົ້າສາມາດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມຫ້ອງນີ້ອີກຄັ້ງໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'room admin' is translated as 'ຜູ້ເບິ່ງແຍງຫ້ອງ'. While understandable, 'ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານຫ້ອງ' (phu borihan hong) - 'room administrator' - would be more precise and professional in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "You will be able to join it again via new invitation by a room admin" is somewhat awkwardly translated. "izmantojot jaunu telpas administratora ielūgumu" is technically correct but doesn't flow as naturally as it could.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vai tiešām vēlaties atstāt šo telpu? Jūs varēsiet atkal pievienoties, saņemot jaunu ielūgumu no telpas administratora.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'de' before 'um novo convite'. While grammatically correct, it can be slightly improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você poderá participar novamente por meio de um novo convite de um administrador da sala. -> Você poderá participar novamente por meio de novo convite de um administrador da sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'de um administrador da sala' which is a bit verbose. A more concise and natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você poderá participar novamente por meio de um novo convite de um administrador.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "කාමරයේ පරිපාලකගේ නව ආරාධනයකින්" (Kaamaraaye paripaalakaage nava aaraadhanaakin) translates more literally to 'with a new invitation from the room administrator.' A more natural and idiomatic translation for 'by a room admin' would be something like 'කාමරයේ පරිපාලකවරයාගේ නව ආරාධනාවක් මගින්' (Kaamaraaye paripaalaka vaurage nava aaraadhanaawaak magin) or simply 'කාමරයේ පරිපාලක මගින්' (Kaamaraaye paripaalaka magin).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයේ පරිපාලක මගින් (Kaamaraaye paripaalaka magin) or කාමරයේ පරිපාලකවරයාගේ නව ආරාධනාවක් මගින් (Kaamaraaye paripaalaka vaurage nava aaraadhanaawaak magin)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You will be able to join it again' is a bit clunky. A more natural Serbian translation would use a more direct phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Моћи ћете поново да се придружите просторији.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is quite long. Consider breaking it into two for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да ли заиста желите да напустите ову собу? Моћи ћете поново да се придружите просторији путем нове позивнице од администратора собе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'join it again' is a bit awkward. 'Pridružite se ponovo' translates literally as 'join again,' but a more natural Serbian phrasing would be 'ponovo možete da se pridružite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da li zaista želite da napustite ovu sobu? Ponovo možete da se pridružite putem nove pozivnice od administratora sobe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "You will be able to join it again via new invitation by a room admin" is a bit clunky. A more natural Chinese phrasing would be '可以通过房间管理员发送的新邀请再次加入' (can rejoin via a new invitation sent by a room admin).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 可以通过房间管理员发送的新邀请再次加入
